title: Yu+Me: Dream Volume 2
description: Nobody ever said love was easy, but trying to date another girl when you're in a Catholic high school makes things even harder. Having made up her mind to confess her feelings to her best friend Lia, all Fiona needs is the right moment. The class trip to Chicago might be the perfect moment, but a boy named James keeps getting in the way. Is he a friend, or an enemy? YU+ME Volume 2 collects issue 5-7 of the hit lesbian webcomic.
author: Megan Rose Gedris
